attributes.action: stop bonuses for bailed out bankers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call on Gordon Brown to follow the approach taken by President  Obama in the US, and immediately cap executive pay within any business recieving state support. We call on him to stop bonuses for bankers who've been bailed out by the taxpayer.  

When was the last time an ordinary person made a right mess of a job and then were allowed to give themselves hundreds of thousands of pounds worth of bonuses as a reward?  More likely if we made such a mess we'd be joining the growing queues of people who've lost their jobs thanks to the crisis the bailed which bailed out bankers started.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
